mapper.select: SELECT review.*, rsv.user_id, mem.nick_nm FROM rsvt_rv review JOIN rsvt rsv ON review.rsvt_no = rsv.rsvt_no JOIN mem mem ON rsv.user_id = mem.user_id AND rsv.biz_no = #{bizNo}
SELECT rownum, m.nick_nm, rv.rv_cn, rv.rv_ymd FROM rsvt_rv rv, rsvt r, mem m WHERE rv.rsvt_no = r.rsvt_no AND r.user_id = m.user_id AND r.biz_no = #{bizNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, M.NICK_NM, RV.RV_CN, RV.RV_YMD FROM RSVT_RV RV, RSVT R, MEM M WHERE RV.RSVT_NO = R.RSVT_NO AND R.USER_ID = M.USER_ID AND R.BIZ_NO = #{bizNo} )
